ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Digest Number 173
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Erudite SK on Innoruuk who is level 18. I so far have been very pleased with him. I have 107 str and 125 int on him right now. Getting the STR up will
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Erudite SK on Innoruuk who is level 18.
I so far have been very pleased with him. I have 107 str and 125 int on him
right now.
Getting the STR up will be easy to get up +8 more and +4 more INT with
Electrum Sapphire earrings.
I learn 1hs,1hs,bash,meditate,channel,taunt, etc all before I am even 2
bubbles into a level.
Due to the high intelligence this has been very helpful especially with
Archery which is already up to 47 skill.
Somestimes my taunt is maxed for the level after using it only 7-10 times.
I would say I am very happy with my Erudite SK. Paineel is a cool place too.

Isasnick - Mystical Legends
18th Season
Innoruuk
